ref_y_max = 6.5
ref_x_max = 7.0
ref_low_bound_result = 1.8846153846153846
ref_high_bound_result = 4.642857142857142
result = lib_arai.get_SCAT_box(self.b, self.x_mean, self.y_mean, self.
    beta_threshold)
self.assertAlmostEqual(ref_low_bound_result, result[0](2.0))
self.assertAlmostEqual(ref_high_bound_result, result[1](2.0))
self.assertAlmostEqual(ref_x_max, result[2])
self.assertAlmostEqual(ref_y_max, result[3])
